contentList.content: Manoeuvres are powerful attacks that utilize your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Dice</LSTag>.

Once per combat encounter, upon dropping to 50% of your total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, you restore [1] Hit Points at the end of your turn. The amount of dice rolled is equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Affected creature will restore [1] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> at the end of their turn.

The <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag> of Spells and Conditions you apply increases by 1 and scales with your levels in Fighter. This bonus is increased to 2 at level five, and 3 at level nine.
Once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>, gain an additional <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>.
You are capable of infusing the weave into your attacks, providing your archery with a supernatural quality - and your foes something to fear.
Through your Arcane Quiver, you tap into the weave itself, enabling you to infuse your <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attacks</LSTag> with various types of magic.
This action utilizes a weapon based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> while also functioning as a <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag>.

Your basic Ranged Weapon Attacks no longer utilize Attack Rolls. As such, they can no longer miss your targets or roll Critical Hits. While active, your basic Ranged Weapon Attack is considered to be a Cantrip.

In addition, while active, your Elemental Fletchings will fire stronger, alternative arrows. This can be toggled at any time.

Loose a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> which cannot miss or roll <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>. Disable <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="FocusedWeave">Focused Weave</LSTag> in order to return to standard Ranged Weapon Attacks.
Infuse the weave itself into your arcane quiver, providing <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attacks</LSTag> with various elemental effects.

Mysticism guides you as you nock your next strike.
A well aimed Spell to snuff the competition.

Infuse magical energy into your arcane quiver, gaining the ability to fire Acidic Arrows which coat the ground in Acid.

If Focused Weave is active, you will instead fire Corrosive Arrows, causing your targets to Corrode.
Loose a projectile bubbling with caustic substances, coating the ground in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ACID">Acid</LSTag>.
Fire an arrow which afflicts your target with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CORROSIVES_SPIT_DILOPHOSAURS_1">Corrosion</LSTag>.

Infuse magical energy into your arcane quiver, gaining the ability to fire Frost Arrows, which can create and stack ice blocks for you to climb, as well as damage enemies, reducing their Movement Speed.

If Focused Weave is active, you will instead fire two Bifrost Arrows, which can damage and slow your targets Movement Speed.

Loose a burst of freezing energy, creating a block of ice which you can climb. Enemies starting their turn within [1] of the block will potentially lose 50% of their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> and take [2].
Loose two beams of pure, arcane frost which slows enemies.

Infuse magical energy into your arcane quiver, gaining the ability to fire Searing Arrows, which generate three stacks of Heat when dealing damage.

If Focused Weave is active, you will instead fire Infernal Arrows, creating explosions of Fire and dealing damage in a [1] radius.
Loose an arrow of searing flame, which generates three stacks of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FIRE_HEAT">Heat</LSTag> when dealing damage.
Loose an arrow roaring like an inferno, which creates a fiery explosion, dealing damage in a [1] radius and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag> your targets.

Infuse magical energy into your arcane quiver, gaining the ability to fire Lightning Arrows, damaging multiple enemies in an line.

If Focused Weave is active, you instead fire Surging Arrows - bolts then fork from your original target, dealing half damage to two other enemies within [1] of them.
Loose an arrow of intense lightning, causing lightning bolts to fork from your original target, dealing half damage to two other enemies within [1] of them.
Loose an arrow housing a crackling lightning bolt, damaging multiple enemies in an line.

Infuse magical energy into your arcane quiver, gaining the ability to fire Lifebreak Arrows, which can be used to heal allies in combat.

If Focused Weave is active, you will instead fire Necromantic Arrows, providing them Death Ward for three turns.
Loose an arrow inscribed with necromantic energy at an ally, providing them with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DEATH_WARD">Death Ward</LSTag> for 3 turns.
Loose an arrow of restorative magic, healing allies when targeted in combat.

Infuse magical energy into your arcane quiver, gaining the ability to fire Poisonous Arrows, which stinks of a dangerous odor that can Poison your targets.

If Focused Weave is active, you will instead fire Contagious Arrows, which will place a Contagion upon your target.
Loose an arrow which stinks of a dangerous odor that <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisons</LSTag> your targets.
Loose a disastrously disease ridden arrow which places a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CONTAGION_FLESH_ROT_COUNTDOWN">Contagion</LSTag> upon your target.

Infuse magical energy into your arcane quiver, gaining the ability to fire Psychic Arrows, Dazing your target.

If Focused Weave is active, you will instead fire Psyburst Arrows, creating a wide cone of psychic energy.
Loose an arrow which fills one's mind with blistering pain, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAZED">Dazing</LSTag> your target.
Loose an arrow which erupts in psionic energy, creating a wave of psychic force.

Infuse magical energy into your arcane quiver, gaining the ability to fire Radiant Arrows, which deal double damage to Aberrations, Fey, Fiends, and Undead.

If Focused Weave is active, each arrow fired at an ally will apply Sanctuary to them for three turns.
Loose an arrow which glistens with radiance, dealing double damage to Aberrations, Fey, Fiends, and Undead.
Loose an arrow which hums with soothing energy, applying <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SANCTUARY">Sanctuary</LSTag> to allies for three turns.

Infuse magical energy into your arcane quiver, gaining the ability to fire Thunderous Arrows, pulling a target toward you by [1].

If Focused Weave is active, you will instead fire Booming Arrows pushing your target backward by [1].
Loose an arrow which reverberates with force, pulling your target toward you by [1].
Loose an arrow which quakes with eruptive force, sending your target flying backward by [1].
Gain the ability to teleport creatures and items through use of your Arcane prowess.
Create two Arcane Gates, which any creature may then use to teleport between.
An Arcane Gateway creatures may use in order to teleport.
Teleport an item to another location.

<LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrips</LSTag> which cost an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> may now be cast using your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>. This may be toggled at any time.
When <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="FocusedWeave">Focused Weave</LSTag> is active, your basic shots now ricochet to two other creatures if within [1] of each other.
When casting a <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag>, reduce the number needed to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> by 2.
When <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="FocusedWeave">Focused Weave</LSTag> is active, your basic shots now ricochet to all other creatures within [1] of your original target.
You approach the complex problems posed by combat with one distinctly effective solution - you will take anything they can throw at you, and protect your allies while doing so.
You approach the complex problems posed by combat with one distinctly effective solution - you will take anything they can throw at you, and protect your allies while doing so.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all forms of physical damage. However, enemies will have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> when making <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against you. In addition, when damaging a target, you have a chance to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHALLENGERS_CALL">Challenge</LSTag> them. This can be toggled at any time.

Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all forms of physical damage. However, enemies have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> when making <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against them.

Once per combat encounter, upon dropping to 50% of your total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, you restore [1] Hit Points at the end of your turn. The amount of dice rolled is equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. In addition to this, you gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_SecondWind">Champion's Windstorm</LSTag>.
Once per combat encounter, restore [1] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>. The amount of dice rolled is equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

Killing a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHALLENGERS_CALL">Challenged</LSTag> enemy refreshes the cooldown of both <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_SecondWind">Champion's Windstorm</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_ImprovedActionSurge">Champion's Surge</LSTag>.
Once per combat encounter, gain an additional <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>.
Once per combat encounter, gain an additional <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>.
Attempt to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHALLENGERS_CALL">Challenge</LSTag> a nearby enemy, as well as any additional enemies within [1] of them.

Whenever you fail a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, you can roll again, using the new result instead. In addition to this, add your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
When making a melee based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, deal additional damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Charisma Modifier</LSTag>.

After using a manoeuvre, gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> for three turns.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Activating <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_ActionSurge">Action Surge</LSTag> restores your <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slots</LSTag>.
After casting a Spell, you may make a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
Affected creature may make a weapon attack as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
When damaging a target, you have a chance to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frighten</LSTag> them.
Killing a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> creature restores one <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slot</LSTag>.
As a paragon of tactical superiority, you employ a wide array of combat techniques to dominate every fight.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_PostureBreaker_Frontier">Frontier: Backbreaker</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Steady_Frontier">Frontier: Brace (Melee)</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Cleave_Frontier">Frontier: Cleave</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ConcussiveSmash_Frontier">Frontier: Concussive Smash</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_CripplingStrike_Frontier">Frontier: Disarming Strike</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DisarmingStrike_Frontier">Frontier: Flourish</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_OpeningAttack_Frontier">Frontier: Heartstopper</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_HeartStopper_Frontier">Frontier: Lacerate</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Slash_New_Frontier">Frontier: Maiming Strike</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_PiercingThrust_Frontier">Frontier: Piercing Strike</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_PommelStrike_Frontier">Frontier: Pommel Strike</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_FullSwing_Frontier">Frontier: Prepare</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_SpringAttack_Frontier">Frontier: Rush Attack</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedStrike_Frontier">Frontier: Unarmed Strike</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Topple_Frontier">Frontier: Topple</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_HinderingSmash_Frontier">Frontier: Weakening Strike</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_SteadyRanged_Frontier">Frontier: Brace (Ranged)</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_HamstringShot_Frontier">Frontier: Hamstring Shot</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MobileShooting_Frontier">Frontier: Mobile Shot</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Affected creature will be able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_PiercingShot_Frontier">Frontier: Piercing Shot</LSTag> again upon the expiration of this status.
Gain mastery of various combat techniques.

Rather than being restored on a Short Rest, your Combat Techniques are on individual cooldowns. Currently, your Combat Techniques refresh once every three turns.

As a Frontier Knight, you are capable of permanently learning the unique weapon based actions of gear you come across on your travels. Upon learning an action from a piece of gear, it is immediately destroyed.
When damaging a creature with one of your Combat Techniques, you may spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Dice</LSTag> in order to increase the damage dealt.
Deal an extra [1] damage to a creature when damaging them with one of your Combat Techniques.

Rather than being restored on a Short Rest, your Combat Techniques are on individual cooldowns. Currently, your Combat Techniques refresh once every two turns.

As a Frontier Knight, you are capable of permanently learning the unique weapon based actions of gear you come across on your travels. Upon learning an action from a piece of gear, it is immediately destroyed.
Upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, all of your Combat Techniques are immediately refreshed.

Rather than being restored on a Short Rest, your Combat Techniques are on individual cooldowns. Your Combat Techniques refresh every turn.

As a Frontier Knight, you are capable of permanently learning the unique weapon based actions of gear you come across on your travels. Upon learning an action from a piece of gear, it is immediately destroyed.
All of your Combat Techniques can now be made as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>. This can be toggled at any time.

When you're within [1] of an ally, you can spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> and a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to switch places with them.
Swap places with a nearby ally.

If an enemy you can see moves close to you, you can use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> and a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> in order to make a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> against that creature.
Make a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> against an enemy who enters your range.

Spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> in order to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DASH">Dash</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISENGAGE">Disengage</LSTag>.

Spend an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to make an attack that attempts to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHALLENGERS_CALL">Challenge</LSTag> your target to only attack you.

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHALLENGERS_CALL">Challenge</LSTag> an enemy to attack only you. The challenged enemy will have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against anyone but you.

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHALLENGERS_CALL">Challenge</LSTag> an enemy to attack only you. The challenged enemy will have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against anyone but you.

Spend an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to direct an ally to strike a foe. The ally may use their <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> on their next turn to make an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.

Direct an ally to strike a foe. The ally may use their <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> on their next turn to make an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Affected creature can spend their <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> to make a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag>.
Directed by your ally, use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> to make a weapon attack.

Spend an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to make an attack that potentially forces the target to drop the weapons they are holding.
Focus your attack on your foe's hands and potentially force them to drop the weapons they are holding.
Focus your attack on your foe's hands and potentially force them to drop the weapons they are holding.

Spend an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISTRACTED">Distract</LSTag> your target, giving your allies <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against it.

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISTRACTED">Distract</LSTag> your target, giving your allies <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against it.

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISTRACTED">Distract</LSTag> your target, giving your allies <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against it.

Spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> in order to increase your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 2 for three turns.
Affected creature's <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is increased by 2.

Spend an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to make a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> against a target with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

Spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to double the reach of your basic <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MainHandAttack">Melee Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedAttack">Unarmed Strikes</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_OffhandAttack">Dual-Wield Melee Attacks</LSTag> for three turns.

Double the reach of your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MainHandAttack">Melee Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedAttack">Unarmed Strikes</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_OffhandAttack">Dual-Wield Melee Attacks</LSTag>.

Affected creature's <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MainHandAttack">Melee Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedAttack">Unarmed Strikes</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_OffhandAttack">Dual-Wield Melee Attacks</LSTag> have double the reach that they normally would.

Spend an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to make an attack. After a successful hit, you may select an ally to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ForcedManeuver">Forced Manoeuvre</LSTag> on. The targeted ally will increase their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> by 50%, and will not provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.

Make an attack. On a successful hit, you may use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ForcedManeuver">Forced Manoeuvre</LSTag> on an ally, increasing their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> by 50%, and preventing them from provoking <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.

Make an attack. On a successful hit, you may use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ForcedManeuver">Forced Manoeuvre</LSTag> on an ally, increasing their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> by 50%, and preventing them from provoking <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Increase an ally's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> by 50%. They will not provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag> when moving.
Affected creature's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> has increased by 50%. They will not provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag> when moving.

Spend an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to make an attack that potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightens</LSTag> your target.
Make an attack which potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightens</LSTag> your target.
Make an attack which potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightens</LSTag> your target.

Spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> in order to enter into a defensive stance. Your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> increases by 10 until the next time another creature makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you.

Enter into a defensive stance, increasing your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 10 until the next time another creature makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you.

Affected creature has entered into a defensive stance. Their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> has increased by 10 until the next time another creature makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against them.

Spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to add a +2 bonus to the result of your weapon based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> for three turns.
Add a +2 bonus to the result of your weapon based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Affected creature has a +2 bonus to the result of their weapon based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Spend an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to make an attack that potentially pushes the target back [1].
Deal an additional and potentially push your target back by [1].
Deal an additional and potentially push your target back by [1].

Spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> in order to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Throw">Throw</LSTag> a grenade or weapon that has the <LSTag Tooltip="Thrown">Thrown</LSTag> weapon property.
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Throw">Throw</LSTag> a grenade or weapon that has the <LSTag Tooltip="Thrown">Thrown</LSTag> weapon property.
Spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to grant an ally [1], bolstering their resolve.

When a hostile creature fails an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you, spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to retaliate with a powerful weapon based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
When a hostile creature fails an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you, retaliate with a powerful weapon based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.

Spend an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to swing your weapon in a wide, sweeping arc, attacking multiple enemies at once.
Swing your weapon in a wide, sweeping arc to attack multiple creatures at once.

Spend an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to make an attack that potentially knocks your target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Make an attack, potentially knocking your target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Make an attack, potentially knocking your target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.

Battle has brought you to the edge, proliferating growth once more.
A clash of steel, sparking the fires of trial within the firmament.
When damaged below 50% of your total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all forms of physical damage.
Affected creature is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to all forms of physical damage while remaining under 50% of their total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.

When an ally within [1] of you is damaged while below 50% of their total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to immediately <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHALLENGERS_CALL">Challenge</LSTag> that enemy, as well as any additional enemies within [2] of the aggressor.

When an ally within [1] is damaged while below 50% of their total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, immediately <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHALLENGERS_CALL">Challenge</LSTag> that enemy, as well as any additional enemies within [2] of the aggressor.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> when not attacking the creature who challenged them.
Upon <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dashing</LSTag>, allies within [1] do so as well.
Gain a +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

Upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> on an enemy, restore one of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Dice</LSTag>. This effect can trigger once per turn.

While making a weapon based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> while wielding a <LSTag Tooltip="TwoHanded">Two-Handed Weapon</LSTag>, your damage dice are rolled with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

When an enemy makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an ally within [1] of you, use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> to impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on the attack. You must be able to see the attacker.

When an enemy makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an ally within [1] of you, impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on the attack. You must be able to see the attacker.
You are unable to be forcibly moved. In addition, your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> increases by 2.

At the beginning of any combat encounter, and upon recovering from a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOCKDOWN_CONDITION_DESCRIPTION">Lockdown Condition</LSTag>, gain status immunity to all Lockdown Conditions for three turns.
Increase your Initiative by 2. Upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RALLY">Rallying</LSTag> another creature, their Initiative is also increased by 2 until they are no longer Rallied.

Once per turn, upon killing an enemy or rolling a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, receive <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag> equal to your level multiplied by two.
When dealing damage, you ignore Slashing <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag>.

When making a weapon based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an enemy with less than 25% of their total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> remaining, deal additional damage equal to your levels in Fighter multiplied by two.
Once per turn, upon rolling a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, immediately <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RALLY">Rally</LSTag> all allies within [1].
When you make a successful melee based <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attack</LSTag>, reduce the targeted enemies <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> to zero.

When an enemy damages you, use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction Point</LSTag> to reduce the damage by -1d4 multiplied by your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. You must be able to see the attacker.
When an enemy damages you, reduce the damage by -1d4 multiplied by your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. You must be able to see the attacker.
While in combat, restore one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> every three turns.
Affected creature will recover one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> when this status expires.

When an enemy damages an ally within [1] of you, use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction Point</LSTag> to reduce the damage by -1d4 multiplied by your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. You must be able to see the attacker.
When an enemy damages an ally within [1] of you, reduce the damage by -1d4 multiplied by your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. You must be able to see the attacker.

Increase the reach of your basic <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MainHandAttack">Melee Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedAttack">Unarmed Strikes</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_OffhandAttack">Dual-Wield Melee Attacks</LSTag> by 50%.

Gain an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction Point</LSTag>. When making an <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>, you roll with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

Learn two manoeuvres and gain a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag> to fuel them. You regain expended Superiority Dice after a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Superiority dice are spent to empower manoeuvres, improving efficiency in combat.
Frontier Knights are paragons of tactical superiority, combining combat manoeuvres and experience in the field to dominate every fight.

Your Superiority Dice fuel your manoeuvres and are expended upon use. You regain expended Superiority Dice after a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
This blade's magical powers only function if it is a Warlock's <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PACT_BLADE">Pact Weapon</LSTag>.

This blade's magical powers only function if it is a Warlock's <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PACT_BLADE">Pact Weapon</LSTag>.

This weapon was wielded by the lionlike Eldritch Knight Cypress of the Starfeller clan, who took on challenges of the heart and mind with palpable brilliance, and fought with a skill and heated intensity that was almost solar.
